participant_1.name: Joe
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and ambitious, Joe loves to challenge himself through outdoor activities.
participant_1.background: I hike up volcanoes to stay fit and challenge myself. I work in retail. I listen to all kinds of music. I aspire to be a millionaire. I'm a vegetarian but I eat fish, especially sushi.

participant_2.name: Katie
participant_2.personality: Creative and sociable, Katie enjoys expressing herself through art and connecting with others.
participant_2.background: I once pretended to be a sports fan and told the cop I was on my way to a game. I want to inspire people with my webcomic and music. Twilight is my favorite book series. I love to go hiking. I like to chat with my friends.

content.text: Hello, I'm Joe. What's your name?
Nice to meet you Katie! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to hike, read, and chat with friends.
Cool! I hike up volcanoes to stay fit and challenge myself. I also listen to all kinds of music. What are some of your favorite books?
My favorite book series is Twilight. I also love to read webcomics.
Oh, I've heard of Twilight. I've never read it though. I'll have to check it out. What's your favorite webcomic?
My favorite webcomic is Awkward Zombie. It's a webcomic about video games.
That sounds interesting. I'll have to check it out. Do you have any other hobbies?
I also like to make music. I have a webcomic and a music blog.
Oh, that's cool! I listen to all kinds of music. What kind of music do you make?
I make electronic music. I also like to cover songs from video games.
That sounds cool! I'll have to check out your music.
Thanks! I'll send you a link.
